title:
Periodic minimum in the count of binomial coefficients not divisible by
  a prime
authors: Hsien-Kuei Hwang, Svante Janson, Tsung-Hsi Tsai
abstract:
The summatory function of the number of binomial coefficients not divisible
by a prime is known to exhibit regular periodic oscillations, yet identifying
the less regularly behaved minimum of the underlying periodic functions has
been open for almost all cases. We propose an approach to identify such minimum
in some generality, solving particularly a previous conjecture of B. Wilson
[Asymptotic behavior of Pascal's triangle modulo a prime, Acta Arith. 83
(1998), pp. 105-116].
